Investment_Pool_PurchaseObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Investment_Pool_PurchaseObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Investment_Pool_PurchaseObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

GiftObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: The selected gift, [gift], does not have any donor contributions available to use for purchasing investment pool units.
validation.description: Gift must have donor contributions available to use for purchasing investment pool units.

validation.validation: Gift  has to be a pooled Gift .

Investment_Pool_Purchase_Data.description: Transaction Date is the day the investment pool units were purchased.

validation.validation: Cannot purchase investment pool units in the future. The Transaction Date must be on or before the current date.
validation.description: Cannot purchase investment pool units in the future. The Transaction Date must be on or before the current date.

validation.validation: The Investment Pool Transaction Date cannot be set prior to the latest recorded Investment Pool Valuation Fiscal Period End Date [latest fiscal period end date for investment pool from gift].

Investment_Pool_Purchase_Data.description: Purchase Date determines the default unit price for the purchase by selecting the Investment Pool Valuation for that date.

validation.validation: The Default Purchase Date cannot be in the future.
validation.description: Purchase Date cannot be in the future.

validation.validation: [pool] does not have a Pool Valuation for the Default Purchase Date, [date].
validation.description: Purchase Date must be in fiscal period with an Investment Pool Valuation for the Investment Pool containing the selected Gift.

Accounting_WorktagObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Accounting_WorktagObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Investment_Pool_Purchase_Data.description: Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize. Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.

validation.validation: [list of worktag types] not valid for this transaction
validation.description: Worktags must be one of the types allowed for the Investment Pool Purchase transaction.

validation.validation: Select a balancing worktag for Worktags of the following type: [type]
validation.description: Worktags must include a Balancing Worktag when worktag balancing is enabled.

validation.validation: Only one worktag of each type is allowed
validation.description: Only one worktag of each type is allowed

validation.validation: [partitionable] is not allowed to be used by [gift company].
[worktag value] is not permitted as an allowed value for worktag type: [worktag type], because it is inactive.
[invalid worktag value message]
validation.description: Invalid Worktag Value.

Donor_ContributionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Donor_ContributionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Investment_Pool_Purchase_Line_Data.description: Reference to a Donor Contribution for the referenced Gift

validation.validation: [contribution] is not available to purchase investment pool units. Confirm that [contribution] is approved, is for the selected gift ([gift]), and has not been used on another approved purchase record.
validation.description: Donor Contribution must not have been referenced on another Investment Pool Purchase Record.

Investment_Pool_Purchase_Line_Data.description: If Override Default Unit Price is set, the line Purchase Date and Unit Price overrides the default values from the header.
Purchase Date determines the unit price to use on the line by selecting the Investment Pool Valuation for that date.

validation.validation: [pool] does not have a Pool Valuation for [date].
validation.description: Purchase Date must be in fiscal period with an Investment Pool Valuation for the Investment Pool containing the selected Gift.

validation.validation: The Purchase Date cannot be in the future.
validation.description: Purchase Date cannot be in the future.

validation.validation: Purchase Date is required when Override is set.
validation.description: Purchase Date is required when Override Default Unit Price is set.

Investment_Pool_Purchase_Line_Data.description: If provided, the line Unit Price overrides the unit price selected by the line Purchase Date.

validation.validation: Donor Contributions may only be used once to purchase investment pool units.
validation.description: Donor Contributions may only be used once to purchase investment pool units.

validation.validation: The following worktag type(s) are required: [missing]
